script: A child, they said. A suitable heir, they demanded. This is the price of preserving the family name.
Preserving the family name, you say? A noble cause, no doubt. But shouldn't one enjoy the journey?
Who dares to speak to me?
Oh, my apologies, good sir. Just saw you from above my book.
And do you normally sit by the road, reading a book?
A source of knowledge, my lord. It helps me pass the time. Are you heading towards the farm house?
Yes I am, and I have no time for more frivolities.
Of course, allow me to take you there. My parents should be inside.
